overview:
Maria Ellison is responsible for Unitrendsâ€™ product and service functional areas: product architecture and management; software and hardware development; manufacturing; field installation; and customer support, training and documentation. Her team has full accountability for the userâ€™s experience of Unitrendsâ€™ product line.

Prior to joining Unitrends, Ellison was Manager of Commercial Information Systems Project Management at BlueCross BlueShield of South Carolina. Earlier, she served as Director of Engineering at SteelEye Technology, and led the team that developed and delivered that companyâ€™s flagship line of software products. Prior to SteelEye, Ms. Ellison held progressively more responsible development positions over a 14-year period with NCR Corporation.

She earned a Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science from Clemson University and graduated Magna Cum Laude.
